title: One-pan chilli eggs with guacamole
description: This classic combo of eggs and avocado is perfect for a spicy brunch or cheeky late-night supper.
ingredients: Good pinch chilli flakes (we used aleppo chilli, from Turkish delis or online specialists), or 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
Good quality bread, toasted and buttered, to serve
1 long red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
Large bunch fresh coriander, leaves roughly chopped
Â½ red onion, very finely chopped

method.Step 1: To make the guacamole, halve the avocados, remove the stones and scoop out the flesh with a spoon. Put in a bowl and mash roughly with a fork, adding a pinch of sea salt. Mix in the rest of the ingredients, then taste and adjust the seasoning. Cover with cling film (see make ahead), then chill until needed.

method.Step 2: When ready to eat, heat the sunflower oil in a large frying pan over a high heat. Crack in the eggs, then fry so the bottoms of the whites go crisp but the yolks stay runny.

method.Step 3: In a small bowl, combine the olive oil with the chilli and some salt and pepper. Once the eggs are cooked to your liking, drizzle them with the oil and put the pan on the table. Serve with the guacamole, and toast for scooping.
